test_scenarios.name: Website Availability
steps: Open the GitLab website (https://about.gitlab.com) in a browser.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The GitLab homepage loads successfully without any errors.

test_scenarios.name: Navigation to Features Page
steps: Click on 'Platform' in the top navigation menu.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The 'Platform' page loads successfully and displays information about GitLab's features.

test_scenarios.name: User Registration - Successful Registration
steps: Enter valid email, first name, last name, company name, country and password.
Check the terms and condition box
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully registered and redirected to the welcome page.

test_scenarios.name: User Login - Successful Login
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the user dashboard.
